me dinawala wadipurama kathabahata lakwana janapi්rayama warithaya ohuyi. 1996 wasare wils loka kusalanaya shri lankawata dinadimedi piththen, panduwen pandu rakimen suwisheshi dayakathwayak dakwu nisawen lowa watinama kridakaya lesa sammanayata pathra wiya.esema danata test tharaga 110 kata krida karamin lakunu 6973 k raskaragena athi sanath shathaka 14 k saha ardha shathaka 31 k laba ganimin ape rate wadima test lakunu raskaragath pithikaruwa bawata pathwa thibe.wisheshayen ekdina tharaga ratawe suwisheshi peraliyak athikara, panduwata waren pahara demin wamath kasakaraya lesa ithihasayata ek wunu sanath me wana wita ekdina tharaga 444 kata krida karamin, lakunu 13428 raskara gena wadima ekdina tharaga sankhyawata sahabhagiwunu shri lankeya kridakaya da weyi.1969 juni 30 da mathara di upan sanath me wana wita 40 wiya ikmawa athath, krida pitiyedi yowun kridakayinta abhiyogathmaka kriyashili kridakayek weyi.krida diwiye loka wartha rasakata himikam kiyamin ape shri lanka mathawage nama lowa pura wada wadath prachalitha kirimata dayakathwaya dun sanath pilibandawa me suwisheshi satahana thabenne ohu thawa dina 4 kin elambaena 2010 parlimenthu maha mathiwaranayedi mathara disthrikkayen tharaga wadimin thawath loka warthawak thabimata sudanam wana heyini.apre්ral 09 wanida parlimenthuwata theri pathwuwahoth ohu methek lokaye siti jathyanthara krikat kridawe niyalemin parlimenthu manthriwarayaku wunu palamu pudgalaya bawata ithihasayata ekwima ema loka warthawayi.
ema pelapaliyata sahabhagiwi katha kala awasthawedi ohu me bawa prakasha kara atha.
mama me aaryanwa munagahenna yanne.
ese nam palamuwa kadawiya yuththe sabhanayakawarayayi.

mema rathu pahathi de antharikshaya thula athi kuda anshu bawata anumana karana athara meya thanin thana pihita thibima thawamath abhirahasakya.khadanaya wim matha athiwuwak yayi sitiya haki wuwada nishchitha nigamanayak nomatha.2015di sathapum 21000kata pamana aathin gath nawathama wiwidhakara chayarupa wala mosayika hadayak athi bawata thahawuru we.idiriyedi thawath mewani nawathama thorathuru sahitha plutoge chayarupa mema nawa abhyawakasha meheyumen diyath wana bawada starn pawasiya.meya widyangayin athara nawa punarudayak athi kirimata samath wana bawa da wishwasayaya.mema diyunu thathwaye thakshanaya magin pluto grahayage sangawunu thorathuru bohomayak idiri kalayan thuladi anawaranaya karaganimata haki bawa nam sathyaya.

hawasa mama hedarin pitath wune ikmanin aayeth gedara ena poronduwa pita.wenada mage bayisikalen parata giyath eda mage bayisikale ee athule dalama awidagenama giye mage yati hithe thiyena aramuna itu karaganime adahasin.mama yaddith tharangalage gedara kattiya pirila.kalaya gatha karanna wadiyenma aasa me kollo tikath ekka eeth mage aawasanawata wibhagayak thiyena nisa ee de mata labune hari aduwen.bayisikale ge athule dala payinma aapu eeka gana ammage hithe sakayak athi wune naha.ammata wunu poronduwa nisa mama ikmanin gedara yanna pitath wune yaluwekge bayisikalayak illagenamayi.awidan giyapu mama bayisikale enawa dakapu amma kara kara hitiya wade nawathwala baluwe mokada me anunge bayisikal ekak aragena enne kiyala.porondu wunu widiyata ikmanin enna oone nisa yaluwekgen bayisikalayak illagena aawa kiyala ammata therum karala dunnama amma amuthu hinawak dala ahaka balagaththe aadambara kamak hithilada nathnam mama kikaru wima gana santhosatada kiyala hithune naha.
